translations.<strong>shareapi_enabled</strong>: Allow apps to use the Share API
translations.<strong>shareapi_allow_public_notificati: Allow users to send mail notification for shared files
translations.<strong>shareapi_only_share_with_group_m: Restrict users to only share with users in their groups
translations.<strong>shareapi_allow_mail_notification: Allow users to send mail notification for shared files to other users
translations.<strong>files_sharing_outgoing_server2se: Allow users on this server to send shares to other servers
translations.<strong>files_sharing_incoming_server2se: Allow users on this server to receive shares from other servers
translations.<strong>outgoing_server2server_share_ena: Allow users on this server to send shares to other servers
translations.<strong>incoming_server2server_share_ena: Allow users on this server to receive shares from other servers
translations.<strong>files_external_user_mounting_bac: Allow users to mount the following external storage
